page.title: 17HOUSING SURVEY
page.content:
We did a survey on the houses in Raunds and Stanwick.We visited 64 houses and asked these questions:- ({ANSWERS IN BLUE})
1) How long have you been living in Raunds? {AVERAGE = 21 YEARS } 2) How long have you been living in your house?{AVERAGE = 21 YEARS 3) How old is your house?{ { AVERAGE = 27 YEARS 4) Do you prefer new or old houses? {NEW = 20 ; OLD = 32 5) What type of house do you prefer? {DETATCHED BUNGALOW 6) How many bedrooms has your house got? {AVERAGE = 3 7) How many people living in your house? {AVERAGE = 3
